Title of DPRK Hero Posthumously Awarded to Kim Yong Sun
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A title of the DPRK hero was posthumously awarded to Kim Yong Sun, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and secretary of the C.C., the WPK.
 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK SPA on it was released on Oct. 27.    
 It is noted in the decree that the DPRK SPA awards the title of the DPRK Hero, Medal of Gold Star and National Flag Order (First Class) to Kim Yong Sun in recognition of his devoted services rendered for raising the international prestige of the WPK, strengthening international solidarity with the Korean revolution and achieving the cause of national reunification under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, holding an important post at the Central Committee of the WPK for years, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

Chinese State Delegation Arrives
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A Chinese state delegation led by Wu Bangguo, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of China, arrived here today by air to pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at the invitation of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Turkey
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Recep Tayyip Erdogan, prime minister of Turkey, on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic of Turkey.
 The message wished the prime minister greater success in his responsible work for the independent development and prosperity of the country and hoped that the friendly relations existing between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

KCNA Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency led by Deputy Director General Ri Ho Gyu left here today to visit China.
 It was seen off at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Chang Gwang, deputy director general of KCNA, and Tian Baozhen, minister councilor of the Chinese embassy here.

Wu Bangguo Refers to His Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Greetings to Turkish President
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Oct. 24 sent a message of greetings to Ahmed Necdet Sezer, president of the Republic of Turkey, on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Turkey would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, and wished the president and the people of Turkey greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.
